name: Shifty Pig
description:
Unleash Fire... or Ice... or Nature... or Void... Whichever you prefer in this bullet-hell protoype developed in a couple of days! Will you be worthy of the name of Shifty Pig? I seriously hope so, or we are gonna be doomed by the "hands" of those little blue guys....

COMMANDS:

WASD (Move)
Directional Arrows (Fire) 

Art and Dev by me :)

Credits for the Music to Discord User Crossedkiller#9132 !!! That bg music is incredible, thank you so much!!

This game was made in roughly 4 days for the Extra Flavour BPJ!

I hope you can enjoy it and leave a feedback for me to grow on :)
